title: Blackberry Meringue Tart
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '280g plain flour', '140g butter', '140g sugar', '1 egg, room temperature', 'juice and peel of 1 lemon', 'Filling', '375g fresh blackberries', '3 eggs, separated', '3 tablespoons cold water', '150g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons hot water', '40g flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder']
